title: Job: Why Is Justice Delayed?
summary: Job questions why the wicked seem to escape judgment. He describes injustices in the world—oppression, poverty, and violence—and wonders why God allows it to continue without immediate consequences.

faq.question: What injustice does Job highlight?
faq.answer: That the wicked often harm others and prosper without punishment.

faq.question: What does Job struggle with here?
faq.answer: Understanding why God delays justice against the wicked.
